turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Treehouse (game).
turn.1: What is the game Treehouse about?
turn.2: Treehouse (game) Treehouse is a game in which players try to get their configuration of Icehouse pieces to match the central configuration, shared by all players.
turn.4: The rolling of the special "Treehouse Die" tells the player what kind of move to make to change his own or the central configuration, and then he does so to best move towards the goal.
turn.6: "Treehouse" was invented by Andrew Looney in 2006 and is sold by Looney Labs.
turn.8: It reflects a change in marketing of Icehouse pieces by Looney Labs, in order to try to improve sales and has become the basis for further marketing of the product.
turn.10: It is sold in two color variants: Rainbow (consisting of black (opaque), blue, red, green, yellow) and Xeno (consisting of white (opaque), purple, cyan, orange, clear).
turn.12: In 2007, "Treehouse" won the Origins Award for best boardgame of 2006.
